excerpt: Lake Constance island reached via a bridge & featuring parks, gardens, a greenhouse & more.
detail_description: Mainau, also known as the Flower Island, is a picturesque island on Lake Constance that can be accessed via a bridge. It boasts beautiful parks, gardens, and a greenhouse. The island offers various attractions throughout the year such as the legendary Fasnacht, open-air theatre performances, and a Christmas market by the lake. Additionally, visitors can explore unique destinations like Sea Life and thermal baths for relaxation. Mainau's Butterfly House is particularly popular among tourists.
name: Mainau

detail_description: Niederburg is a charming town in Germany where you can unwind at its delightful boutiques, shops, wine caves, and coffee houses. Remarkably, the town escaped the destruction of World War II, leaving its historic buildings intact. The old city boasts a wealth of architectural wonders and historical significance waiting to be explored.
name: Niederburg

excerpt: Historic, wood-paneled eatery featuring traditional fare, plus a terrace & lake views.
detail_description: Konzil is a historic restaurant housed in a 15th-century building with wood-paneled interiors and a terrace offering scenic views of Lake Constance. The city of Konstanz boasts several notable attractions, including the Konzil edifice dating back to the 15th century, Niederburg (Lower Castle), Schnetztor fortified gate, Imperia sculpture, Archaeological Museum, and Jan Hus Museum.
name: Konzil

excerpt: Museum showcasing artwork & cultural artifacts relating to city & regional history, plus a cafe.
detail_description: The Rosgarten Museum Konstanz is a must-visit for museum enthusiasts, offering a fascinating insight into the region's history and culture. Located in a city known for its vibrant atmosphere and technological innovation, the museum showcases a wide range of artifacts dating from prehistoric times to the 20th century. Housed in a former guildhall, visitors can explore exhibits related to art, culture, and historical objects with high historical value.
name: Rosgarten Museum Konstanz

excerpt: This red stone obelisk with sculptures depicting historical figures is a popular city meeting point.
detail_description: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Konstanz, Germany, the Kaiserbrunnen, or Emperors Fountain, stands as a striking red stone obelisk adorned with captivating sculptures that pay homage to historical figures. This iconic landmark not only highlights the city's pivotal role in the Holy Roman Empire but also serves as a delightful gathering spot for locals and visitors alike.
name: Kaiserbrunnen

detail_description: The Rheintorturm museum is located on the side of the Rhine River, just close to Swiss. It is a tower that was used as a defense tower and a gate. The atmosphere in this area is extremely nice, and the lake is very close that makes people can swim and go for a picnic too. This museum is perfect for someone who wants to take a peaceful vacation!
name: Rheintorturm

excerpt: Family-friendly exhibits with a variety of sea creatures (most offer play areas & group packages).
detail_description: SEA LIFE Konstanz, located in the city of Konstanz, Germany, is a popular family-friendly aquarium offering a diverse range of marine habitats to explore. With over 30 aquariums spanning 3,000 square meters, visitors can marvel at more than 3,000 freshwater and saltwater fish as well as various sea creatures like sharks, rays, and sea turtles. The attraction provides an opportunity for both kids and adults to discover the underwater world without getting wet.
name: SEA LIFE Konstanz

excerpt: 30-ft. statue on a rotating pedestal, depicting a woman holding Pope Martin V and Emperor Sigismund.
detail_description: Imperia is a famous landmark in Konstanz, located at the end of the city's pier. This nine-meter-high concrete statue, created by local sculptor Peter Lenk, depicts a woman holding miniature statues of Pope Martin V and Emperor Sigismund. The statue rotates around its axis once every four minutes, attracting visitors with its audacious mechanism and aesthetic appeal. Imperia is known for its controversial yet intriguing portrayal of a barely dressed woman wearing a fool's cap.
name: Imperia

detail_description: Jan-Hus-Haus - Seezeit Wohnanlage has been a center of veneration for the Czech scholar and reformer Jan Hus for over 200 years in Konstanz. During the Council of Constance in 1415, Hus was burned at the stake as a heretic. The modern exhibition at Jan-Hus-Haus is dedicated to his life and work, complemented by annual special exhibitions.
name: Jan-Hus-Haus - Seezeit Wohnanlage

detail_description: Herosé Park is a popular destination in Konstanz, located on the site of an old textile factory. The park offers a peaceful retreat with its shady trees and well-maintained greenery. Visitors can stroll along tranquil paths and admire the lush surroundings, as well as explore monuments like the Kaiserbrunnen fountain that honors past emperors. Situated by the Rhine, the park provides benches for relaxation and easy access to the water for swimming or enjoying snowy winter days.
name: Herosé-Park

excerpt: Storied 14th-century city gate known for its half-timber facade, plus a clock face & a bell tower.
detail_description: Schnetztor is a storied 14th-century city gate in Konstanz, known for its half-timber facade, clock face, and bell tower. It was part of the city wall with over 20 watchtowers and gates that protected Konstanz in the Middle Ages. Today, it stands as one of three remaining fortifications defining the southern end of the old town.
name: Schnetztor

detail_description: Konzilgebäude is a historic 600-year-old building located between the neogothic train station and city park. Initially a warehouse, it later became a religious site and was where Pope Martin V was elected in 1417. Today, it houses a restaurant serving traditional German dishes like wiener schnitzel and offers stunning views across Lake Constance. The building is well-maintained, with event rooms showcasing the city's history through murals.
name: Konzilgebäude

detail_description: Casino Konstanz is a well-known casino in Germany, part of the Baden-Wurttembergische Spielbank GmbH & Co KG. Despite its average or small size, it offers a thrilling experience with various table games and over 100 slot machines. The casino has a dress code but is known for its friendly staff and clean environment. It's popular for classic games like roulette, blackjack, and poker, as well as offering special promotions for first-time visitors.
name: Casino Konstanz

detail_description: Bodensee-Therme Konstanz is a modern spa and sports pool located near Lake Constance. With 3,000 square meters of water, it offers various amenities for visitors to swim, bathe, and relax. The facility includes family-friendly features such as low showers and small changing facilities for young children. Additionally, the spa boasts indoor and outdoor pools, a thermal pool with views of the lake, a sauna area, and an open-air pool with warm temperatures.
name: Bodensee-Therme Konstanz

detail_description: The Kulturzentrum am Münster stands out with its striking red facade, serving as a vibrant hub for culture, education, and the arts. This venue brings together various cultural institutions under one roof, creating a rich tapestry of offerings for art enthusiasts. Visitors can explore exhibitions from the Kunstverein and Wessenberg-Galerie, along with events at Turm zur Katz and Gewolbekeller until September 30, 2024.
name: Kulturzentrum am Münster

excerpt: Casual restaurant offering a rotating list of soups, a salad bar & dessert, plus outdoor tables.
detail_description: Suppengrün soup & salad BAR in Konstanz is a casual restaurant that caters to various dietary needs, offering a rotating list of soups, a salad bar, and desserts. The menu includes healthy options such as crispy salads for vegetarians, gluten-free and lactose-free dishes, as well as sugar-free treats. The restaurant prides itself on using regional ingredients without additives.
name: Suppengrün soup & salad BAR

detail_description: Eugens Bio Patisserie is more than just a cafe, as it offers not only delicious coffee and cake, but also a variety of German and international cuisine. The rustic atmosphere adds to the charm of this place, where you can enjoy healthy food made from organic farming. If you prefer gluten- and lactose-free options, they cater to your dietary needs upon request. While the portions are generous and the flavors are generally good, some dishes tend to be on the salty side.
name: Eugens Bio Patisserie

detail_description: Stadtgarten is a picturesque city park located in the heart of Konstanz, offering a peaceful retreat with its well-maintained flower beds and meandering pathways. Situated by the waterfront, it provides stunning photo opportunities along the lakeshore and captures the essence of urban life in Konstanz during summer. In the evenings, it becomes a vibrant social hub with music adding to its enchanting ambiance.
name: Stadtgarten

excerpt: Scenic, tranquil nature preserve popular for viewing different types of plants, birds & animals.
detail_description: Wollmatinger Ried - Untersee - Gnadensee is a serene and picturesque nature preserve that offers the opportunity to observe a diverse range of plant and animal species. The area is home to nearly 300 different types of birds and boasts an impressive array of around 600 distinct varieties of flora. Visitors can enjoy a peaceful and pastoral experience, surrounded by lush greenery, clean roads, and smooth trails.
name: Wollmatinger Ried - Untersee - Gnadensee Nature Reserve
address: NABU-Bodenseezentrum Am Wollmatinger Ried 20, 78479 Reichenau, Germany

detail_description: The Pulverturm, constructed in 1321 by the Jewish inhabitants of Konstanz, is a remarkable historical structure. This squat and robust edifice boasts walls that are two meters thick. Its presence cannot be overlooked when entering Konstanz via the bridge, as it stands as a welcoming symbol of the city's history. It is highly recommended to observe this tower closely, as its intricate details and significance make it a sight worth beholding.
name: Pulverturm

detail_description: The amusement park 'Kletterwald - Mainau Erlebniswald' offers thrilling activities like climbing trees in the forested area of the mainland near Mainau.
name: Kletterwald - Mainau Erlebniswald

detail_description: Visit the Obermarkt in Konstanz, also known as the Konstanzer Obermarkt, for a delightful shopping experience. The charming atmosphere adds to the enjoyment of browsing through its long alleys lined with beautifully painted houses.
name: Obermarkt

excerpt: Konstanz is a city on Lake Constance (Bodensee), in southern Germany. Its preserved medieval district of Niederburg includes the Romanesque Konstanz Cathedral, known for its mix of decorative styles and a Gothic spire. The town hall is covered in delicate frescoes and has a Renaissance-style courtyard. The Rosgartenmuseum chronicles the region’s cultural history, exhibiting prehistoric to 20th-century objects.
detail_description: Konstanz, a charming city located on the shores of Lake Constance in southern Germany, boasts a well-preserved medieval district called Niederburg. This area is home to the impressive Konstanz Cathedral with its unique mix of decorative styles and a striking Gothic spire. The town hall is adorned with delicate frescoes and features a Renaissance-style courtyard, while the Rosgartenmuseum showcases cultural history through exhibits spanning from prehistoric times to the 20th century.
name: Konstanz

excerpt: Grand Catholic church with frescoes, statuary, 2 organs & an observation tower open to the public.
detail_description: The Konstanz Münster cathedral is a beautiful and historic church that is open to the public. It features beautiful frescoes, statues, and an observation tower. There are also two organs available for use.
name: Münster Unserer Lieben Frau

detail_description: The Hus-Museum in Konstanz offers a captivating journey into the medieval world and the life of Jan Hus, a prominent Czech reformer. Housed within the historic walls of the old town, this museum pays homage to Jan Hus and his impact on European history. It provides insights into the Council of Constance and captures the essence of that era. Visitors can expect to learn about Jan Hus's travels from Bohemia to Constance and gain a deeper understanding of the European Reformation.
name: Hus-Museum

excerpt: Museum showcasing locally excavated artifacts since the Neolithic Age, plus programs for kids.
detail_description: The Archäologisches Landesmuseum Baden-Württemberg in Konstanz, Germany, is a renowned archaeological museum that delves into the ancient history of the region. Nestled near the scenic shores of Lake Constance, this museum boasts an extensive collection of artifacts dating from the Stone Age to the Middle Ages. Visitors can explore prehistoric tools, Roman relics, and medieval items, gaining insight into the cultural and historical evolution of Baden-Württemberg.
name: Archäologisches Landesmuseum Baden-Württemberg

detail_description: The tourist attraction Palmenhaus Konstanz is a small green house located in the city of Konstanz. It is managed by the Bund and presents regular talks and other activities to provide a calming atmosphere. Additionally, it features a large greenhouse with tropical plants and a fish pond.
name: Palmenhaus Konstanz

excerpt: Baroque castle & count's residence with a palm house, events hall & café on a Lake Constance island.
detail_description: Schloss Mainau is an impressive baroque castle and residence located on an island in Lake Constance. The site features a palm house, events hall, café, playgrounds for children, and picturesque paths to stroll along the water and through trees and flowers. Visitors can explore the butterfly house and admire the thousands of tulips during Easter holidays. Inside the main house, there is a nice café and exposition of handcrafted items with a stunning view of Lake Konstanz.
name: Schloss Mainau

excerpt: Traditional pub fare offered in an airy, relaxed alehouse that has a sprawling riverside terrace.
detail_description: Located in Konstanz, Germany, Constanzer Wirtshaus is a traditional pub offering a relaxed atmosphere and serving up classic pub fare. The airy alehouse features a sprawling riverside terrace, providing an excellent view of the lake. The menu includes regional specialties such as homemade Kaspressknodel in flavorful vegetable broth for starters and the vegan version of southern Germany's typical Maultaschen as a must-try dish.
name: Constanzer Wirtshaus

detail_description: The Schmetterlingshaus - Insel Mainau is a zoo with a variety of different animals from all over the world. It is an amazing once-in-a-lifetime experience to see all kinds of butterflies from all over the world.
name: Schmetterlingshaus - Insel Mainau

excerpt: Relaxed restaurant with a rotating menu featuring small plates & seafood, plus cakes, coffee & wine.
detail_description: Nestled conveniently near the Konstanz train station, Das Ess/Bar is a vibrant and relaxed eatery that showcases an ever-evolving menu brimming with creativity. This trendy spot offers a delightful array of small plates inspired by Euro-Asian cuisine, featuring tantalizing options like beef carpaccio, pulled pork buns, and gluten-free carrot cake. The atmosphere is casual yet lively, making it perfect for enjoying tapas-style dining in good company.
name: ess/bar

excerpt: Nostalgic restaurant in an elegant building serving classic & contemporary French dishes.
detail_description: Brasserie Colette Tim Raue is a nostalgic and elegant restaurant located in Konstanz, offering a delightful blend of classic and modern French cuisine. The restaurant exudes a charming nostalgic ambiance where guests can savor delicious dishes from bistro, Mediterranean, and European cuisines. The diverse menu is complemented by an extensive selection of beers, cocktails, and healthy vegetarian options.
name: Brasserie Colette Tim Raue

excerpt: Chic glass-walled trattoria with a large terrace, plus occasional live music & stand-up comedy.
detail_description: Located in Konstanz, Germany, Il Boccone is a stylish glass-walled trattoria with a spacious terrace that offers an authentic Italian atmosphere. Guests can enjoy occasional live music and stand-up comedy while indulging in a diverse menu featuring pizzas, European specialties, Mediterranean delicacies, as well as healthy vegan and vegetarian dishes. The restaurant's beautiful ambiance and pleasant terrace make it an ideal spot to savor thin and crunchy pizzas while immersing in the Italian vibe.
name: Il Boccone

detail_description: Dolce Vita Coffee Shop is a great place to enjoy a delicious cup of coffee. The staff are friendly and welcoming, and the atmosphere is relaxing and inviting. There are seats outside if you wish to relax and watch passersby while sipping your drink.
name: Dolce Vita Coffee Shop

detail_description: Galerie Lachenmann Art in Konstanz is a must-visit for art enthusiasts. The gallery showcases exceptional works by artists with successful exhibitions and collections. Visitors can admire a diverse range of art forms including paintings, drawings, photographs, sculptures, conceptual art, and videos. This contemporary art space features intriguing artists working across various media and is highly recommended for anyone with an interest in contemporary art.
name: Galerie Lachenmann Art

detail_description: Strandbad Horn, located in Constance, offers a picturesque and free beach experience that was actually exchanged for other land in 1907. The site features an idyllic beach with extensive sunbathing areas popular among visitors of all ages. Families can enjoy a dedicated kids pool and playground, while everyone can relax at the cafe or kiosk. The beach boasts platforms for easy access to the water, sparing visitors from pebbles on the shore.
name: Strandbad Horn

excerpt: Contemporary lake-inspired shopping mall on 3 floors, with 70+ outlets & restaurants.
detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Konstanz, the LAGO Shopping Center is a contemporary haven that draws visitors with its lake-inspired design and vibrant atmosphere. Spanning three floors, this expansive shopping destination boasts over 70 diverse outlets and restaurants, making it a one-stop shop for all your needs. Whether you're on the hunt for everyday essentials or unique finds, LAGO has you covered—from clothing and accessories to home goods and appliances.
name: LAGO Shopping Center

excerpt: Small island with 18th-century castle & butterfly house, landscaped with diverse flowers & trees.
detail_description: Mainau, also known as Flower Island, has a rich history dating back to 400 BC and is currently managed by the Bernadotte family. The island features a historic castle, park, and gardens that attract approximately 1.2 million visitors annually. It boasts a diverse collection of plants from around the world and is home to a unique butterfly pavilion that provides an optimal environment for these delicate creatures to thrive and reproduce. Visitors can even interact with the butterflies up close.
name: Island Mainau

detail_description: If you're in Konstanz and craving a taste of Singapore, look no further than Meera. This charming restaurant offers an enticing blend of Indian and Asian cuisine that will transport your taste buds to exotic locales. The atmosphere is vibrant and inviting, making it the perfect backdrop for enjoying beautifully presented dishes crafted with care. Meera stands out not only for its delicious offerings but also for its excellent value, especially during lunch where you can indulge in a three-course meal at an affordable price.
name: Meera

detail_description: Bowling Las Vegas, a popular bowling alley, provides an enjoyable experience for those who love the sport. When visiting a new city, it is highly recommended to try out this establishment. The employees are friendly and accommodating, although their service may be slightly slow at times. Despite this minor setback, the prices are reasonable and everything runs smoothly on the lanes. With ten lanes available and additional amenities such as pool tables, Bowling Las Vegas is definitely worth considering for a fun-filled bowling experience.
name: Bowling Las Vegas

detail_description: Kloster Zoffingen is a monastery in Altstadt Konstanz, Germany. It was founded in the 10th century and is home to a number of art treasures including a 12th-century Romanesque cross.
name: Kloster Zoffingen

detail_description: Discover a unique shop called See U - Souvenirs & Gifts in Konstanz am Bodensee, offering exclusive and premium keepsakes and presents. Standing out from mass-produced items, this store showcases handcrafted treasures crafted by skilled artisans or specialized manufacturers. With an ever-evolving collection, innovative designers continuously introduce new brands and designs each year. Whether you're searching for an extraordinary gift or something special for yourself, this store has a wide range of options to explore.
name: see u - souvenirs & gifts in konstanz am bodensee

detail_description: At Gastro Naturfreunde, you can enjoy a delicious steak served with fresh vegetables and other German dishes in a beautiful setting. The restaurant has an outdoor seating area for a great view.
name: Gastro Naturfreunde

detail_description: If you find yourself wandering through the enchanting streets of Konstanz, make sure to stop by CONTIGO Fairtrade Shop. This delightful store is a treasure trove for those seeking unique items like handcrafted jewelry, bags, and exquisite postcards made from handmade paper. But that's not all! At the coffee bar, you can indulge in aromatic coffees that are freshly roasted right before your eyes on select days. The atmosphere is inviting and tranquil, providing a perfect escape from the bustling tourist scene outside.
name: CONTIGO Fairtrade Shop Konstanz

detail_description: Schlosskirche St. Marien is located right next to the castle on Mainau and is well-maintained with a visually appealing exterior. It serves as a beautiful location for weddings, offering a stunning interior with impressive paintings and architecture. Despite some feedback about the chairs affecting the atmosphere, visitors appreciate its overall beauty and charm both inside and out.
name: Schlosskirche St. Marien

detail_description: Bismarckturm Konstanz is a historic site offering stunning panoramic views of Konstanz, the Bodensee, Switzerland, and the Alps. It's a popular spot for visitors to relax, enjoy a picnic, or have a barbecue while taking in the breathtaking scenery. The tower also provides an ideal setting for a small bonfire as the sun sets over the city.
name: Bismarckturm Konstanz

detail_description: Historische Hafenuhr is a charming historic landmark located in a city with beautiful sights of lakes and rivers. It's a great place to explore on foot, especially on cold winter days when the warmth of the people and the lively atmosphere contrast with the weather. The view of the lake and the Alps is truly amazing, making it a perfect spot to spend some restful time and take in the beauty of nature.
name: Historische Hafenuhr

detail_description: Spitalkellerei Konstanz is a charming winery that offers classic regional grape varieties from Lake Constance. While the wines are good, some may find them lacking a standout flavor. The prices are generally on the higher side for this region. It's considered the best option for local wine in the Bodensee area and their Pinot Noir comes highly recommended.
name: Spitalkellerei Konstanz

detail_description: I was pleasantly surprised when a close friend invited me to the Christmas Garden event at Insel Mainau. The circular route on the island offered a delightful experience with its enchanting theme of fairy tales. Thanks to Lake Constance, the weather was exceptionally enjoyable, making the entire journey even more pleasant. The highlight of the event was undoubtedly the stunning light show, which I highly recommend attending.
name: Christmas Garden Insel Mainau

detail_description: The Hoerle Park is an excellent place to spend a peaceful afternoon, if you are looking for a quiet and scenic spot. The park has many large trees and its garden is ideal for a picnic. There is also a nice lake in the park that makes for a great cycle ride or walk.
name: Hoerlepark
